Message.Title: Thank God! Obama's Inauguration.... His Last!!
Message.Msg: It's all downhill from here! Let's hope he won't totally destroy the Country! But we need to keep in mind that he is officially and finally a Lame Duck! We're probably safe for the next 2 years! It's the last 2 that get scary! Even if the House falls, maybe the center-right Supreme Court will hold together and Roberts will grow a pair!

Message.Title: video of assasination attempt on Bulgarian Prez
Message.Msg: good gosh. Check out that video of a guy who tried to kill the Bulgarian prez while making a speech. Perp put a gun to his head, pulled the trigger, but the gun misfired. Then he perp was tackled and beaten by audience members. What a scene.

Topic.Title: video of assasination attempt on Bulgarian Prez

Message.Msg: not the Bulgarian prez. Bulgarian opposition leader, he is.

Topic.Title: Thank God! Obama's Inauguration.... His Last!!

Message.Msg: Unfortunately, this wahoo will probably get to add 2-3 SCOTUS members over the next 4 years. Given his predilection for socialism and government as parent, he will make his last two look downright conservative!

Topic.Title: Thank God! Obama's Inauguration.... His Last!!

Message.Msg: As long as he's replacing the SCOTUS Pigs it's OK! The conservatives can outlast the S0B!
Some things have stood the test of time. Others are considered perversion.
